summary: A talented songwriter of sambas is forced to face the social injustices of the city around him.
cast: Grande Otelo|Jece Valadão|Malu Maia|Maria Petar|Haroldo de Oliveira|Edson Vitoriano|Carlos Aquino|Artur Vargas Jr.|Iracema Vitória|Zé Keti|Angela Maria|Sofia Alcalai|Nilton Apolinário|Celso Aquino|José Carlos Araújo|Walkiria Barbosa|Mozart Cintra|Ivan De Souza|Erley Freitas|Paulo Goulart|Ferreira Maia|Sérgio Malta|Almir Saint Clair|Laurita Santos
keywords: rio de janeiro|songwriter|social injustice|samba|new latin american cinema
title: Rio, Zona Norte
